Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences

Class DynamicPreferences

java.lang.Object
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
public class DynamicPreferences extends Object
Helper class to handle shared preferences operations like saving or retrieving the values from default shared preferences.

It must be initialized once before accessing its methods.

    • initializeInstance

      public static void initializeInstance(@Nullable Context context)
      Initialize preferences when application starts.

      Must be initialized once.

      Parameters:
      context - The context to retrieve resources.

    • getInstance

      @NonNull public static DynamicPreferences getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of DynamicPreferences.

      Must be called before accessing the public methods.

      Returns:
      The singleton instance of DynamicPreferences.

    • getContext

      @NonNull public Context getContext()
      Returns the context used by this instance.
      Returns:
      The context to retrieve the resources.

    • getSharedPreferences

      @NonNull public SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences(@Nullable String preferences)
      Returns the SharedPreferences object for the supplied name.

      Use null to get the default shared preferences object.

      Parameters:
      preferences - The name of the shared preferences.
      Returns:
      The shared preferences object.
      See Also:
      • Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int)
      • PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context)

    • delete

      public void delete(@Nullable String preferences, @Nullable String key)
      Remove a key from the supplied shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The shared preferences to be used.

      Set null to use the default shared preferences.

      key - The preference key to remove.
      See Also:
      • getSharedPreferences(String)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.remove(String)

      Remove a key from the default shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      key - The preference key to remove.

      Returns:

    • deleteSharedPreferences

      public void deleteSharedPreferences(@Nullable String preferences)
      Delete a shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The preferences to be deleted.

      Set null to delete the default shared preferences.

      Delete the default shared preferences.
      See Also:

    • isNullKey

      public static boolean isNullKey(@Nullable String key)
      Checks whether the key is null as listener returns null key when it is removed (or cleared) since API 30.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the key is null.

    • save

      public <T> void save(@Nullable String preferences, @Nullable String key, @Nullable T value, boolean removeOnNull)
      Save a preference value in the supplied preferences editor and call SharedPreferences.Editor.apply() to apply changes back from this editor.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of shared preference.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The shared preferences to be used.

      Set null to use the default shared preferences.

      key - The preference key to be saved or modified.
      value - The value for the preference.
      removeOnNull - true to remove key if the value is null.
      See Also:
      • getSharedPreferences(String)
      • delete(String)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.putBoolean(String, boolean)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.putInt(String, int)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.putFloat(String, float)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.putLong(String, long)
      • SharedPreferences.Editor.putString(String, String)

    • save

      public <T> void save(@Nullable String preferences, @Nullable String key, @Nullable T value)
      Save a preference value in the supplied preferences editor and call SharedPreferences.Editor.apply() to apply changes back from this editor.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of shared preference.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The shared preferences to be used.

      Set null to use the default shared preferences.

      key - The preference key to be saved or modified.
      value - The value for the preference.

      value - The value for the preference.

    • load

      public boolean load(@Nullable String preferences, @Nullable String key, boolean value)
      Retrieve a boolean preference value from the supplied shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The shared preferences to be used.

      Set null to use the default shared preferences.

      key - The preference key to be retrieved.
      value - The default value for the preference.
      Returns:
      Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

      Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean.

      See Also:
      • getSharedPreferences(String)
      • SharedPreferences.getBoolean(String, boolean)

    • load

      public boolean load(@Nullable String key, boolean value)
      Retrieve a boolean preference value from the supplied shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      key - The preference key to be retrieved.
      value - The default value for the preference.
      Returns:
      Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

      Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean.

      See Also:
      • load(String, String, boolean)
